history.proof: intros m nms H1 H2. induction nms as [| nm nms IH]. - simpl. apply NoDup_nil. - simpl. apply NoDup_cons. + hauto use: tot_map_in_in unfold: fst, name, msg, In, snd inv: NoDup. +

ctx: induction nms as [| nm nms IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment base_fst, base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o' fail_fst : FailureParams multi_fst fail_snd : FailureParams multi_snd fail_map_congr : FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd base_map overlay_fst : NameOverlayParams multi_fst overlay_snd : NameOverlayParams multi_snd overlay_map_congr : NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency overlay_fst overlay_snd name_map m : msg nm : name * msg nms : list (name * msg) H1 : forall nm0 : name * msg, In nm0 (nm :: nms) -> snd nm0 = m H2 : NoDup (nm :: nms) IH : (forall nm : name * msg, In nm nms -> snd nm = m) -> NoDup nms -> NoDup (map (fun nm : name * msg => (tot_map_name (fst nm), tot_map_msg (snd nm))) nms) contra : In (tot_map_name (fst nm), tot_map_msg (snd nm)) (map (fun nm : name * msg => (tot_map_name (fst nm), tot_map_msg (snd nm))) nms) Unable to unify "snd ?M1646 = m" with "False".

original: intros m nms H1 H2. induction nms as [| nm nms IH]. - simpl. apply NoDup_nil. - simpl. apply NoDup_cons. + intros contra. apply H1. simpl. auto. + apply IH. * intros nm' H3. apply H1. simpl. right. auto. * apply H2.
